mapper.select: select la.id, ai.name apartment_name, ri.room_number, la.status lease_status, la.lease_start_date, la.lease_end_date, la.source_type, ri.rent, gi.name, gi.url from lease_agreement la left join apartment_info ai on la.apartment_id = ai.id and ai.is_deleted = 0 left join room_info ri on la.room_id = ri.id and ri.is_deleted = 0 left join graph_info gi on la.room_id = gi.item_id and gi.is_deleted = 0 where la.is_deleted = 0 and la.phone = #{phone}
